simplesect.para: returns state that is owner of this fsm submachine. returns null if this is a root machine.

briefdescription.para: returns hierarchic state (path to root) of a state

simplesect.para: true if current state returned in path argument, false otherwise

parameterdescription.para: optional event for starting the machind

memberdef.name: FindAbortDestinationState
memberdef.qualifiedname: HFSMBase< Class FSMStateBase, Class FSMEventBase, Class FSMActionBase, Class FSMGuardBase >::FindAbortDestinationState

parameterdescription.para: event that will be used to find suitable transition from current state

simplesect.para: FSM_OK if transition found and allowed by guard (if any)
FSM_NO_TRANSITION if no unguarded transition found in submachine or local machine

memberdef.definition: HFSMBase< Class FSMStateBase, Class FSMEventBase, Class FSMActionBase, Class FSMGuardBase >::ProcessAbortEvent
memberdef.name: ProcessAbortEvent
memberdef.qualifiedname: HFSMBase< Class FSMStateBase, Class FSMEventBase, Class FSMActionBase, Class FSMGuardBase >::ProcessAbortEvent

briefdescription.para: instructs the hierarchical state machine to process the event e

parameterdescription.para: event that will be used to find suitable transition from current state

simplesect.para: FSM_OK if transition found and allowed by guard (if any)
FSM_NO_TRANSITION if no unguarded transition found in submachine or local machine

memberdef.definition: HFSMBase< Class FSMStateBase, Class FSMEventBase, Class FSMActionBase, Class FSMGuardBase >::ProcessEvent
memberdef.name: ProcessEvent
memberdef.qualifiedname: HFSMBase< Class FSMStateBase, Class FSMEventBase, Class FSMActionBase, Class FSMGuardBase >::ProcessEvent

briefdescription.para: instructs the hierarchical state machine to process the event e

parameterdescription.para: event that will be used to find suitable transition from current state

simplesect.para: FSM_OK if transition found and allowed by guard (if any)
FSM_NO_TRANSITION if no unguarded transition found in submachine or local machine
